channel.title: Can anyone help meh with 2 things
channel.description:
1. i need to know how to make my server...like when ppl type the ip in it takes them there 2. i need help putting item codes in E.g ::barrows , ::dragon , ::rich , so on so fourth... can anyone help me plz ill be gratefull :)
ty.

item.title: Can anyone help meh with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

jst give ppl ur i.p www.whatismyip.com
or use a dynamic ip…www.no-ip.com then get a dynamic and then get no-ip duc…

item.title: Can anyone help meh with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

what source u using?

if its testscape or cheezscape open up client java and do ctrl + f

search for END OF FRAME TESTING

paste these in there

else if (command.startsWith("dragon")) { addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(4585,1); addItem(1149,1); addItem(1187,1); addItem(1377,1); addItem(775,1); addItem(4131,1); addItem(4151,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(6585,1); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(4710, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4753, 1); addItem(4755, 1); addItem(4757, 1); addItem(4759, 1); addItem(4745, 1); addItem(4747, 1); addItem(4749, 1); addItem(4751, 1); addItem(4732, 1); addItem(4734, 1); addItem(4736, 1); addItem(4738, 1); addItem(4726, 1); addItem(4728, 1); addItem(4730, 1); addItem(4724, 1); }

make sure u dont have these already

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help meh with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @mod_danny mod danny
item.description:
@mod_danny wrote:

lol ok umm… dude all u do for the ::rich and ::dragon is go to dodian.com then you click item list on the right hand side. next u make your own server and get on and write ::pickup (code) (how many u want) and there u get wut u want…

Read full topic
